meanings.definition: A person who makes a will.
meanings.sent1: The testators carefully planned their wills to ensure their wishes were carried out.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer met with the testators to discuss the details of their wills.
meanings.sent3: The testators joked about including their pets in the wills, but ultimately decided against it.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of the law, testators hold the power to determine the fate of their possessions after death.
meanings.sent5: The testators' wills stood as a testament to their thoughtful consideration of their loved ones.
